name: Are You Kidding Me?
storyline:
Meet GoodLuck [she/her] , MothBot [he/him] Jester [he/they], Rhea [they/she], and a few more eclectic and unusual creatures who look after the island, which takes the shape as a little amusement park!

Have very normal conversations with each to get to know them and their little worlds better. Learn to settle into and become part of this community through a short linear narrative.

Learn more about the world and help out it's quirky inhabitants through unusual mixed media microgames! Carry out different tasks and jobs through playing through these fast-paced funny microgames, each set, thematically cohesive & comfortably fitting into the narrative.
summary: A slice of life adventure with a collection of narrative driven micro games all about the inhabitants of Nowhere Space - where all lost and forgotten things end up.
